text: gumazir kam lepan arɨmariam an iti.13:11 Hibruia arɨmariar kam ziar avɨribar a dɨbori, “lepan arɨmariam.” Arɨmariar kam lepan arɨmariar e datɨrɨghɨn garimɨn mɨrara garir puvatɨ. Eghtɨ ofa gamir gumazim kamaghɨn gumazim mɨkɨm suam, ‘Nɨ Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir puvatɨ.’ Ofa gamir gumazim fogha gɨfa, gumazir kam a mɨzezir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn amizɨ, a pura gumazim ateghtɨ, a uabɨra uan dɨpenimɨn ikian kogham.
